name: SIK Space Invader Kreature
description: SIK - Space Invader Kreature is a multiplayer shooter, a frantic experience of eliminating the hordes of invaders. Rush through the Wayans, unlock paths, create a strategy with your online friends and defeat all the invader creatures using different types of weapons, grenades, and powerups during the match,  but be careful, as these creatures increase their speed and stamina as you begin to kill them. Make sure to use your points to upgrade to higher-tier weapons to also defeat the Alux that will show up, the most dangerous known form of these alien invaders.
publishers: Brisia Fabiola Aguirre Ponce de Leon
